name: Gladiator Gauntlet (MisterZee)
description:
Use WASD to move

Esc to exit at any time

Survive the gauntlet for 8 rounds! A round is complete when you gather enough stars! Stars spawn every 10 seconds so keep moving and dodging!

There are three types of shots to watch out for:

Flame shots scatter randomly across the field, be careful to avoid the explosions when they land as they hurt too!

Homing shots charge after you, but they're too fast for their own good and can easily pass up their target!

Spike Rock shots fire rapidly at you, so just keep moving to avoid them!

If you're feeling up for a bigger challenge, try some of the higher difficulties which take away health refill spawns or even put you in with only one HP! 

Tips for noobs:

Stars are wiped from the field between levels, but hearts stay, so try to preserve them for the end.

Homing shots are faster side to side than they are up and down, so try to lead them to the side so they shoot past you.

If a star is in a hard to reach place, just leave it and wait for more to spawn.

With the exception of hard mode, you'll heal between levels, so take the risk for that last star so you can heal up.

Let me know what you think! Your feedback is always valuable!

Edit: If you've already downloaded, try again and both required files should be in there now! Apologies!
